name: _ga
description: Google Analytics cookie Analytics cookie used to generate statistical information on the use of a website.

name: _gid
description: Google Analytics cookie used to distinguish users and sessions.

name: _gat
description: Google Analytics cookie used to throttle request rate.

name: _gcl_au
description: Google AdSense cookie used to experiment with advertisement efficiency across websites using their services.

name: _fbp
description: Facebook cookie used to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real time bidding from third party advertisers.

name: cookieConsent
description: Cookie used to manage user consent for cookies.
